Class AndroidMini2DxGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.android.AndroidGraphics
      • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.android.AndroidMini2DxGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class AndroidMini2DxGraphics
extends com.badlogic.gdx.backends.android.AndroidGraphics
    Overrides AndroidGraphics to add mini2Dx's timestep logic
